summary: Implements a plugin that adds HTTP endpoints for Open Library administrative and analytical operations, including cache management, configuration reloading, usage statistics retrieval, edition counting, user existence checks, recent record lookup, identifier translation, and provides utilities for record indexing, title and ISBN normalization, and memcached entry invalidation.
business_intent: Provides internal tools for system administrators and automated processes to monitor, maintain, and troubleshoot the Open Library platform, ensuring data consistency and operational visibility.
